crosswordDatas.clue: A grammar where a language sentence has more than one parse tree.
leveraging an existing compiler or interpreter to develop a new version of the same compiler or interpreter.
The table records the names of variables, functions, and other program elements and their characteristics and qualities.
The process of breaking a sequence of characters into tokens, which are meaningful units for the compiler.
The process of analyzing the syntax of a program to determine its grammatical structure according to a formal grammar.
A hierarchical representation of the syntactic structure of a program, typically used for further analysis and code generation.
The phase of compilation where the compiler translates the intermediate representation into target machine code for execution.
